gutter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the low part at the edge of a road where water collects and flows away
gutter.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The gutters were blocked and overflowing.
gutter.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an open pipe fixed to the edge of a roof to collect and carry away rainwater
gutter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if a candle gutters, it burns with an unsteady flame
